original_title: Broncho Billy and the Sheriff's Office
overview: Broncho Billy is requested to resign his office as sheriff. John Jenkin's son is appointed his successor. The new sheriff is given a severe fright a few days later when the bad man of the town enters his office and threatens to shoot him. After this episode he sends in his resignation not having the nerve to serve as sheriff.
title: Broncho Billy and the Sheriff's Office
